headline.main: CHURCHMEN ASK DEFEAT OF HITLER; Every Step to Accomplish the Purpose Is Called Our National Duty

lead_paragraph: The Right Rev. Henry St. George Tucker, Presiding Bishop of the Protestant Episcopal Church, made public yesterday a statement signed by thirty Episcopal bishops, clergy and laymen, declaring that the type of isolationism which denies the concept of the family of nations "must be judged to be contrary to the Christian gospel."
abstract: opposed by 30 Episc bishops; text of statement
